reviewText:
I bought this mainly because I'm into staring at naked girls and sort of was interested in trying yoga. The part about staring at naked girls is great: no problems there! There are lots of close ups of her nude bod, and lots of slow panning all over her while she's posing. The camera is not shy about panning to the areas of her body in which you would buy this dvd for. The slow panning adds to the excitement of watching. There's not a lot of up close shots of her butt area. Mostly breasts and some vag. Lots of breast tho. She's really normal and everyday looking, not porn star'ish. Nothing is too gratuitous. Well made dvd. Natural lighting, so sometimes there is shade, but you can still see what you want to see.

This dvd will not show you how to do yoga, and it's going to be pretty difficult if you're buying it for that reason. I thought I would try it because a.)I love naked girls b.)what better way to actually WANT to watch a yoga dvd when the chicks naked? Well, if you already have some base knowledge of the yoga positions, this would be a good dvd for you to follow along with and motivate you while also rewarding you with nude girl. There is no talking or instruction, just mellow wood chime type music and the occasional Zen quote.

Worth purchasing if you already know a little about yoga and you appreciate hot naked girl doing yoga and are looking for an excuse to follow along with the dvd.

Worth purchasing if you just want to watch a pretty (nude!)lady doing yoga in a sunny, tranquil setting.

NOT worth purchasing if you wanted to learn yoga.

I'm the only person I know who has a yoga-related injury - a knee weakened by having to sit on my heels for an hour every morning and evening for the few months I was enrolled at a yoga-schram.  Eventually I had to have arthroscopic surgery to trim my torn meniscus, and this experience turned me off yoga.
My interest in these videos is therefore entirely aesthetic and erotic, and it's a toss-up as to which of the two young yoginis is more lovely.  The blonde in the first video is very young - possibly still in her late teens - and she smiles joyously.  The brunette is a bit older - mid-twenties I'd guess.  Her smile seems forced and she does not appear to have emptied her mind as completely as the blonde. Neither woman seems uncomfortable at being mother-naked, and both have taken pains to look their best, with painted nails, shaved armpits and carefully trimmed (or waxed?) body hair, umbilical piercings, and tasteful abstract tattoos.
The main difference between the two videos is in the explicitness of the camera-work.  The first video, with the blonde, is so discrete that students of yoga could find themselves handicapped, and for the voyeurs among us this hiatus is frustrating.  The second video abandoned this caution, leading to a franker exposure of the brunette, whom we get in full-frontal camera angles, with no attempt to hide or avoid what the French call "la chatte." Such directness helps us see her as a whole human being.  This seems to me a healthy attitude, and one in keeping with the philosophy of yoga, which sees sex as nothing to be ashamed of.
There is a Hindu holy book, the KAMA SUTRA, that is a how-to guide to yogic lovemaking.  It would be fascinating to watch a video of a couple practicing yogic sex.  One particularly fascinating practice - which I would love to see - is the male yogi's reputed ability to reclaim his seed by reversing the process by which it was expelled.  I wonder if this seeming physiological impossibility can actually happen.  Does anyone know whether a video of a yogi and yogini making love is available, and if so, where?

My girlfriend enjoys yoga and oddly enough nude females so we watched this together. A lot of the techniques she displayed my girlfriend already knew so we skipped a great deal through the title. The model was focused actually too focused much like a robot...so if you were thinking this is something sensual you are mistaken. This film is more of a exhibition of yoga without clothes of course then anything that will want you or her to enhance your sex life.
This video was much better that the "worship the sun" title by the same studio.  Better lighting, sharper focus, less fuzzy interludes, just better overall.

I enjoyed this video. I don't know much about Yoga but wondered what my wife does at her Yoga classes.
Yes this was a work of art. But what held my attention was her amazing strength and control, great
camera work, and that wonderful body. The setting and sounds add to it in a way that make the experiance
complete.

I was familiar with Pure Nude Yoga, so I knew to some extent what to expect, but this was better than expected. To start off, the yoga model is beautiful. Her movement and transitions are fluid and graceful. She executes some very advanced poses with seeming effortlessness and absolutely no shaking. The visuals are lush and powerful. There's a nice, relaxing cadence to the editing with slow dissolves that goes really well with the hypnotic music. The overall effect is that you get to spend time in a magical and serene zen garden with a lovely yoga model.
Beautifully demonstrated. The lovely lady knows yoga...as one can see from her body.
Trash

I am a 39 year old man and finding it harder to bend over squat down and general ranges of motion. I work several hours a day with a demanding job and don't need to "work out' I tried this yoga and after a few sessions found myself feeling much better and a lot more mobile. This is nothing crazy just relaxing and very good stretching excercises. I told my wife if anyone says it's a chick thing I can tell them I have a beautiful nude instructor that makes it not gay. lol
Great DVD.  Beautifully shot.  Was very helpful in learning more advanced poses
I won't say much about it... Just that the teacher is very hot.. By the way I didn't learn anything about yoga I was distracted.. Lol
nude yoga how could you go wrong
good video..The actress is model and star of few clips for sale videos ( bodybuilding and bondage)
Very relaxing to watch
Excellent technician. Easy to follow and well corographed.
nice body
Need more like this Amazon
Not the greatest.
It's a delight for the person that likes to be free while practicing yoga. Not for beginners though.
the best buy

This dvd was tastefully done.  The model  is very beautiful.  It answers both of my questions of: 1. what do I look like when I'm doing my poses and 2.  What would the women around me look like naked.  Well done.  My only complaint is I wished that there was a voice over with the instructor guiding us through the poses.
If you've ever seen Wenona in her hardcore BDSM shoots on kink.com or back on Insex, you know she's very flexible. Yoga is how she got that way!

Shocker here, spoiler alert: No yoga pants. None, nadda, zilch. I felt duped.

This movie is great for nudity and you see it ALL. The yoga scenes were inspiring. You might watch this several times just for the eye candy, but in the process will learn many yoga poses. I hope this woman does more nude movies.

This is a well made video with excellent tracking of yoga positions, stretching, and poses. The added benefit is a very beautiful uninihibited nude teacher and model for learning or showing yoga positions. This video is very tastefully put together and clearly shows the professional making of a quality video.
It was a very pleasant and entertaining video. The Goddess was incredible. The music was relaxing. The scenery was very well suited. Reminded me of my time in Japan.
very sexy if you like yoga they women's really hot really focused not a great video to learn yoga to but very sexy none the less
No actual yoga instruction. Not a good yoga video to follow along with, and too boring to be considered erotic.
I love the yoga lady you have to keep your eye on her to complete the work out but I don't mind watching her it can break your yoga focus
yoga is so boring but when you see a beautiful naked woman in a beautiful garden your heart and eyes melt...and no these is not porn, its moving art.

I just really enjoyed watching her go through her poses. She was totally focused and completely unselfconscious . If you enjoy watching lovely nude women this is a good choice. If you like yoga so much the better.
The slow movement of her in her yoga positions was very erotic.  I bought this for pornographic purposes and found it to be worth the rental fee.
I loved the total honesty concerning the nude portrayal of yoga postures.  I felt really intimate with the subject performing the postures.
absolutely wonderful, you can see which muscles are being engaged. To me the human body is Gods work of art, if you have a nice one, show it off :)

You'll probably laugh, but I got this DVD in an effort to persuade my husband to try Yoga with me.  His job has him overly stressed, and I wanted him to try meditation or yoga. He's always refused my suggestion of giving meditation of yoga a try. I thought this dvd might help get him on the mat. Sadly, it didn't (laughs). I tried. I failed. Stubborn man.

As a dvd, this isn't bad. I'm not offended by nudity, so if you're interested in giving yoga a try, this isn't a bad dvd.

I don't personally do yoga myself, but this is absolutely beautiful. You have a beautiful woman doing multiple yoga stances, with very relaxing background music, and scenery. I must say if you enjoy the beauty of a nude woman this video is very calming and relaxing.
This was a great video on how to do Yoga. Also how to enjoy it more when you are naked.

Not to everyone's taste, assuredly, but if you have the background to appreciate this specialized film, it is most excellent.  Personally, I use it as an adjunct to sitting meditation, allowing it to fade in and out.  The sights and sounds are very conducive.  Each image is thoughtfully framed and left on screen a satisfyingly long time.  I love the soft-focus, still shots of the bamboo, the iris, and other garden features that background the Yoga.  The thought-provoking quotations from Buddhist tradition are also a nice touch.

Yogini Wenona is in exemplary shape, toned and flexible.  Her poised, confident execution of each pose is a "teachable moment."  That she is nude allows the viewer to clearly see and appreciate every bodily nuance of her practice.  (Porn fans and prudes, there is nothing for you here.  Move along, move along.)

The play of light and shadows in these images says they were mostly shot at "magic time" in the early morning or late afternoon when garden greens are most intense.  I must express sympathy for Wenona in what appears to have been an all-day shoot.  Toward the end,  her shoulders, arms and chest were looking distinctly sunburned.

Of the three programs in the Pure Nude Yoga series so far, this is my favorite, but I hope the producers will continue to create new episodes.  Other possible settings come to mind: redwoods, mountains, the interior of a monastery or Zen center, almost anywhere a person can find a quiet, scenic setting for an hour of asana.  This is first rate film-making, and I want to see more of it.

The unobtrusive soundtrack of wind chimes and/or natural sounds is a perfect accompaniment to the visuals.

If I am allowed a minor quibble, I do find the director's frequent use of the "Beam me down, Scotty," lap/fade camera trick to make our Yogini "magically" appear on her empty mat before each new sequence to be an unnecessary distraction.
I enjoy practicing yoga with this gorgeous flexible woman. I like that there are no words as well...hope you. Enjoy it as much..

This yoga  instructor was not shy about being in front of the camera and she did not act like a porn star. If you are wanting porn, do not get it. The camera does do a lot of close ups. If you are wanting to learn yoga, this is not a video to learn off of. If you know some yoga and into nude art, you may enjoy this video. Very relaxing.
Too eastern fo my taste without enough variety of moves. Lacked any production, musical variety and plot, although ti acting was well done.
Yes it's a naked lady, but the ability to see how the body accommodates the movements was very instructive and unique.

It shows the same girl doing yoga but it's kind of boring. There are a few good scenes but overall I wouldn't recommend it if your looking for a movie that has some good scene action. If your interested in actually doing yoga and following along then I guess I would recommend it.
I found this move interesting and education in learning and practicing yoga. It felt it was a quality production and I would recommend it
The video music could have been better.  Also, some of the parts they showed of the body were not needed to see the yoga poses.

Professionally done, 1080p HD. Plenty of yoga exercises. Keep in mind, instruction is done by 25 yr.

I'd love to have her teach me yoga in the nude. Perfect structure and form! Definately recommend this video to everyone.

This product delivers what it says; however, Ocean Goddess video is probably the best in the series, followed by this, and then ending with Worship the Sun. The yoga moves are not as clear and fluid for the beginner, but it gets the job done.  Delivery and shipping were as expected!
What more could you ask for? I mean, it is what it is, it is NOT porn, but it is pretty hot.

The Goddess actually forces me to relax and do Yoga meditation. Although I will never be able to move or bend in any of the poses that she does, I try and in some, get close. Wonderful vid!

I stumbled upon this video and since I love the sight of the nude young female form, I decided to get it as a somewhat titillating backdrop of sorts when doing my yoga routine. When the dvd arrived I was not disappointed. It serves my intention perfectly. The girl is gorgeous in an everyday way (all the better than the 'perfect' photo model looks in my opinion) and knows her Yoga. The zen-like location this was filmed in is perfect. So to sum up - this is perfect if you (find women attractive and) want a stimulating backdrop when doing yoga at home in front of the TV or other big screen, and although you will indeed see 'everything', this is not something for the person who's looking for video as arousing as garden variety pornography.
nice video its cool she looking hot lol I like it a lot  nice songs and sounds are nice 2

 Oh, and did I mention it was oh so hot!

great right through whole movie I would say that the only slow part in between work out when they have saying

The model in this video (Wenona) is very attractive and sexy. She is also very good at doing yoga. She is in shadow much of the time so all you see is a silhouette. It's too bad too because the girl is truly beautiful.
I have seen videos where the model obviously doesn't know anything about yoga. This woman obviously has some  experience. She moves from pose to pose slowly and with perfect form. The way I imagine yoga was intended to be done, or at least the restorative yoga practice. You would have a difficult time practicing yoga along with her since there is no verbal cueing. I suppose one might practice their own personal routine using this video for background. Watching her going into and out of the positions can be a teaching aid. She is very good, and nice to look at. You can see what a pose is all about when the camera zooms in on her.  The video has two audio settings, one with some pleasant oriental music and one with nature sounds only.
This woman knows how to Yoga. Some of the advanced yoga positions are to hard for me to do. But I love the Cat and Cow.

I realize that people are used to porn models, and a particular type of face/body, but this is a very fit, very real woman, this is a nice showcase of what a real, fit person looks like rather than some fake porno model girl.
She poses very nice, no trembling, seeing her muscle tone glisten in the sun is nice to behold.
Pure Nude Yoga is a good purchase, it's not only for the obvious purposes, it's relaxing to watch somebody do this and not always be focused on the sexual aspect of it.

Very peaceful with the "new age" music and the lush greenery.

It was erotic and sensual...while being very tasteful and beautiful.
The video selected was the wrong one, but after watching a few minutes it wasn't too bad. Just kind of slow.
The was a wonderful and pleasurable DVD.  I found it very relaxing, calming, and beautiful.  I would definitely recommend it.

Let's face it, this video is basically soft core porn. No discussion of yoga postures or anything else yoga.  Lots of close-ups as the camera slowly glides over the "yogini's" body and quite fearlessly at that. Camera, have you know shame! Guess not. Isn't yoga all about the natural and connection with nature the spiritual. Ironic that the lady has fake fingernails and, shall we say surgically augmented...well you know...

My wife is a woman who does yoga about six days a week and we viewed this video together.  She noted that she does a different more active yoga, less meditative.  Zen Garden Goddess moves fluidly and that she is unburdened by clothing allows the viewer to follow her moves and admire the poise and strength embodied in her movement.  We look forward to other videos from ZGG.

I wasn't too impressed with this video. I'm thankful that I had the sense to view it on On Demand for only $2.00 before stupidly paying way more money for it than it's worth! While it's true that on the display, the model looks very eye catching, in the video she doesn't really look nearly as good. Her breasts are not even that big (though the photograph might make you think they are), and they even seem a bit malformed. Her pubic area is shaved almost entirely balled. I don't know why, but I have an extreme prejudice against this. It just doesn't look natural. I don't actually mind trimmed pubic areas, but bald ones or bald ones with a bit of a mustache on top (like the model in this video) are already too rampant in many XXX adult videos. Why do I need this just to see another cheap tramp in disguise doing nude yoga?

However, if you like good calming music and are in it for the art and scenery with some nice fancy quotations thrown at you, it might be worth buying on On Demand. If you're watching this expecting to get a hard on, look elsewhere. As for me, I'm satisfied with the rental for now.

I have an appreciation for the female body, and this emphasizes that pretty well. If anything it's relaxing, the model (to be honest) isn't as attractive as she seems on the cover. This also isn't very informative if you're actually trying to get into yoga and all that. Anyway I recommend this, and it was very much worth buying.

This is ok to watch..if you want to see a pretty naked female who is silent the entire film doing yoga poses.

What it's not, is an instructional yoga video.  It announces the pose before the scene, but does not verbally instruct or say anything.  You will fall asleep if you actually try to watch the entire dvd(at least 1 hour), and the lighting is not done very well.  The sunlight is way too bright on many of the poses.

It is shot in a Japanese-like garden setting with a little brook and some plants all around.

Each pose lasts a long 5-7 minutes, and repeats camera angles going slowly up and down the yoga model.

It is moderately exciting to see in certain poses, but it's not a graphic porn-you will only see at most some shaved labia. Besides, I doubt anyone could actually watch this in it's entirety more than once.

If you are extremely curious about this, I suggest renting it.
Very slow camera, but would would of got 5 stars if she had a partner to help her out in the moves
They should have made this a long long time ago because every guy has been convinced by a girl at sometime to try Yoga. Well this got my attention. Great video.

Yoga helps us build the mind body connection and it nice to see this Zen garden goddess share her practice. I think this video is well done for what it offers with out being low grade porn.
  I gave this 4 out of 5 stars because the boardwalk is too small of a location for a video like this. I can understand that if your are really practicing alone this my be an ideal spot to practice in the nude. As for video filming it is not. I would have loved to follow along with this model and have seen some more wide shots of her as she practices. Part of yoga is getting your body art right through the use of poses and this model does her poses well. It is really wonderful to see this model in her poses. She shows us that she is not just another fly by night out to make a quick buck by taking her clothes off for yet another nude video. Thank you all who made it and keep them coming.

After a brief viewing of the video, I can appreciate the tone and style of the video.  Just the same, I prefer Wenona's earlier work as an erotic wrestler on Ultimate Surrender or even in some of her bondage model performances for Kink.com.  As one previous reviewer has stated, Wenona was possessed of a remarkably ripped physique, which was not evident in her role as Zen Goddess.  Still, her flexibility demonstrating yoga was almost nothing compared to some of the situations she endured in Hogtied or Device Bondage.  I respect that porn performers can have diverse interests and aspects of their personality, but it's tough to totally submerge myself into the Zen mindset with so many intense images of Wenona to recall.

When you read reviews that go something like, "I really wanted to watch a naked woman stretch..." or "the chick seemed hot" then it's probably not really an exercise video.  That being said, yes, it's a wonderful video of a beautiful, naked woman doing yoga.  I vaguely remember some relaxing background sounds/music, but no instruction is given.  Curiosity, got me on this purchase....
This video is nicely done in a beautiful environment with a very enticing and sensually exotic woman. I found myself enjoying the serenity as well as the sexuality...

At first, I found this video frustrating. She wasn't as hot as I was expecting. When I hear "26 year old Goddess" I don't think chubby wrists, jello thighs, elongated nose, and frizzy hair. It looks like she's been using "natural" shampoos. And then occasionally the camera would cut to some Lilly pads and some obnoxious quote would fade in. Look, lady, I know Buddha means a lot to you, but I didn't pay $1.99 to see inspirational quotes.

But then something strange happened. Maybe it was the Zen-ness of the garden that started to seep into my psyche, but I all of the sudden found myself floating on a psychospiritual energy field, kind of like Jeffrey Lebowski, and I felt my petty concerns about the female "standard" of beauty start to evaporate into a sea of passion and serenity and peace. Sure, maybe her wrists are chubbier than I would like, but did you notice, when the sunlight was just so, the splendor of those tiny soft filaments of lower-back fuzz? There's some unconventional beauty there. I could get with a girl like that.

I haven't seen this so I am just commenting on the idea presented here. But there are two things that just don't go together: working out and rubbing one out. But I will say that the girl on the cover is pretty hot.

It appears to be a regular blue DVD-R that you or I would burn instead of the silver kind that most professionally produced movies are on. I'm not sure whether or not this has anything to do with the lower resolution.

Tasteful and esthetically pleasing, with a spiritually calming and also slightly arousing effect. I almost wished it was even a little more explicit.... Recommended.
